name: Space rider
description:
How to play

Fly from one asteroid to the other without running out of fuel.

You can collect fuel but it will only refill your fuel tank once you land somewhere.

Have fun!

Controls

W-A-S-D or the arrows

If you could leave a positive review if you enjoyed the game it would mean a lot to me.

Credits

Game by Spawn_13

Sounds by Le Brick

Assets found on pixelartmaker.com

Thank you for playing my game
